Handle to the Mouse

Events

EVENT_AXESone or more mouse axis values changed.  Fields: x, y, z, dx, dy, dz.
EVENT_BUTTON_DOWNa mouse button was pressed.  Fields: x, y, z, button.
EVENT_BUTTON_UPa mouse button was released.  Fields: x, y, z, button.
EVENT_ENTER_DISPLAYthe mouse cursor entered a window opened by the program.  Fields: x, y, z.
EVENT_LEAVE_DISPLAYthe mouse cursor leave the boundaries of a window opened by the program.  Fields: x, y, z.
